title: Does the society we live in have any significance in understanding the self? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes. Every society has an impact on how they define the Self. There is not only societal differences, but historical ones in regards as to how the Self has been conceived. Ours is an individualistic society. The Self in America is coceived as individualized and it is therefore idolized

It is up to your mind to get to know about yourself how you respond to all the events and occurrences in your life. All you need is your desire to get to know about who you are and why you are here would gives a clear view of yourself and your life journey.
Thank you - and how are you? The typical answer of an introvert ;) Do you know how i really am? No - right? ;) Never mind - hoping YOU ARE AT YOUR BEST :)
